actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to extend the time period during which benefits under such chapter may be utilized by veterans whose medical disabilities have prevented them from using such benefits.

summary.text: Extends past December 31, 1989 (the current deadline), the provision of educational assistance benefits to those veterans who: (1) are not entitled to benefits under the All-Volunteer Force Educational Assistance program; and (2) were prevented from completing a program of education before such date because of a physical or mental disability which was not the result of the veteran's own willful misconduct. Terminates such assistance in any case after December 31, 1995.

titles.title: To amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to extend the time period during which benefits under such chapter may be utilized by veterans whose medical disabilities have prevented them from using such benefits.
